description: Gooey soft boiled eggs make a rich topping for this warm broccoli and lentil salad.
keywords: Lentil salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Broccoli,Tree nut free,Egg,Lemon,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dairy free
name: Lentil, Broccoli & Soft Boiled Egg Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 medium red onion, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the dressing ingredients together in a small bowl.

Cook the eggs for 6 minutes in a large pan of boiling water, drain, place the eggs in a bowl of cold water and fill the pan with fresh water. Bring to the boil and cook the broccoli spears for 2-3 minutes until tender.

Heat the lentils according to pack instructions, toss in a large bowl with the dressing and warm broccoli. Peel the eggs, slice in half and serve on top of the lentils with fresh parsley scattered over the top.
